channel.title: 508 still need help again
channel.description:
Hello..
I recently redid the shop system in the 508 server I am using to use the actual shop interfaces. Ever since then though, it is taking a very long time to get to a point where my client actually 'connects to update server.' Could it be the server trying to load all the shops first, probably? Maybe its just my very low RAM... 256mb idk... :S
Any way I might fix this to start up the server faster? (besides more RAM or buying a new computer)
I might add that eventually it loads the shops but comes up with this (i know the error and what it means, I'm just having a little trouble):
[code][ loaded shops ] Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError at rs2hd.Server.main(Server.java:53) Caused by: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 19 at rs2hd.content.Shops.<init>(Shops.java:56) at rs2hd.Engine.<clinit>(Engine.java:110) ... 1 more[/code]

item.title: 508 still need help again
item.dc:creator: @ghostly150 ghostly150
item.description:
@ghostly150 wrote:

Hello…

I recently redid the shop system in the 508 server I am using to use the actual shop interfaces. Ever since then though, it is taking a very long time to get to a point where my client actually ‘connects to update server.’ Could it be the server trying to load all the shops first, probably? Maybe its just my very low RAM… 256mb idk… :S

Any way I might fix this to start up the server faster? (besides more RAM or buying a new computer)

I might add that eventually it loads the shops but comes up with this (i know the error and what it means, I’m just having a little trouble):

[ loaded shops ] Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError at rs2hd.Server.main(Server.java:53) Caused by: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 19 at rs2hd.content.Shops.<init>(Shops.java:56) at rs2hd.Engine.<clinit>(Engine.java:110) ... 1 more
